Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws.
Items.ActionName: Hearing Held by Committee
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending the rent stabilization laws.

Items.Title: Resolution determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2015.
Items.ActionName: Hearing Held by Committee
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2015.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to approve, A.1865, in relation to repealing vacancy decontrol.
Items.ActionName: Hearing Held by Committee
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Repealing vacancy decontrol. (A.1865)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation that would create a review process for Individual Apartments Improvement rent increases and  make such increases a temporary surcharge rather than a permanent rent increase.
Items.ActionName: Hearing Held by Committee
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create a review process for Individual Apartments Improvement rent increases and  make such increases a temporary surcharge rather than a permanent rent increase.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation that would end deregulation of rent regulated apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: End deregulation of rent regulated apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.951, which repeals provisions of the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974 that allow a 20 percent rent increase bonus after the vacancy of a tenant in a rent stabilized unit.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Repeals provisions of the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974 that allow a 20 percent rent increase bonus after the vacancy of a tenant in a rent stabilized unit. (S.951)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.2830,  legislation amending the administrative code of the city of New York, the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974 and the Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, in relation to making the Major Capital Improvement (MCI) rent increase a temporary surcharge.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974 and the Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, in relation to making the Major Capital Improvement (MCI) rent increase a temporary surcharge. (S.2830)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.398, which will provide rent control tenants relief from high rent increases.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Provide rent control tenants relief from high rent increases.  (A.398)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.2828/A.3809, which prohibits property owners from adjusting the preferential rent amount upon the renewal of a lease for a rent stabilized unit.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Prohibits property owners from adjusting the preferential rent amount upon the renewal of a lease for a rent stabilized unit. (S.2828/A.3809)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A. 344 in relation to Mitchell-Lama and Project-Based Section 8 developments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Mitchell-Lama and Project-Based Section 8 developments. (A.344)
